purpose: Enable interoperable communication and collaboration among AI agents to solve complex problems.
principle: Implements Google's Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol to allow agents to exchange information and coordinate tasks.
reusability: Designed as a library for easy integration into Python projects, supporting interoperability among various AI agents.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues, and limited to features supported by the A2A protocol.
name: python-a2a
description: Python A2A is a powerful, easy-to-use library for implementing Google's [Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol](https://google.github.io/A2A/). It enables seamless communication between AI agents, creating interoperable agent ecosystems that can collaborate to solve complex problems.
highlight: Facilitates seamless communication between AI agents using Google's Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol.
